name: P35
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated camera mounted under roof eave, suburban home backyard with patio and lawn at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A recognized child from the household. The child plays in the backyard, running around and playing with toys. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering patio and yard, wide-angle with slight edge softening, Clear high-quality footage typical of daytime security camera recording. Realistic human motion, 15-second duration.
